Metadata.name: Useful Calendar - With Spoilers
Metadata.author: rudiger__gb
Metadata.description:
===Enable only ONE Useful Calendar package!===
Adds additional in-game event dates to the calendar:
-Bookstore restocked -Croco Fur restocked -Bulletin Board updated -Crane Game restocked -New S. Link available -New quest(s) available -Story deadlines -Characters' birthdays
This version contains MAJOR STORY SPOILERS and is recommended for those who have played P4G before.
